languages.text: {n}Дознаватель горько улыбается и бережно снимает с себя ваши руки.{/n} "Ты не понимаешь... пока не понимаешь. Надо было остановиться. Я виноват. Ты... ты поймешь, почему".

traits.locale_text: {n}Дознаватель горько улыбается и бережно снимает с себя ваши руки.{/n} "Ты не понимаешь... пока не понимаешь. Надо было остановиться. Я виноват. Ты... ты поймешь, почему".

languages.text: {n}The Interrogator smiles caustically and gently removes your hands.{/n} "You don't understand... not yet, at least. I had to stop. I'm sorry. You... You'll see why."
languages.original_text: {n}Дознаватель горько улыбается и бережно снимает с себя ваши руки.{/n} "Ты не понимаешь... пока не понимаешь. Надо было остановиться. Я виноват. Ты... ты поймешь, почему".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Interrogator smiles caustically and gently removes your hands.{/n} "You don't understand... not yet, at least. I had to stop. I'm sorry. You... You'll see why."
{n}The Interrogator smiles caustically and gently removes your hands.{/n} "You don't understand... not yet, at least. I had to stop. I'm sorry. You... You'll see why."
{n}The Interrogator smiles caustically and gently removes your hands.{/n} "You don't understand... not yet, at least. I had to stop. I'm sorry. You... You'll see why."
{n}The Interrogator smiles caustically and gently removes your hands.{/n} "You don't understand... not yet, at least. I had to stop. I'm sorry. You... You'll see why."

languages.text: {n}海因里希露出了痛苦的笑容，温柔地挪开了你的手。{/n}“你不明白……至少现在还不明白。我不得不停下来。我很抱歉，你……你会明白原因的。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator smiles caustically and gently removes your hands.{/n} "You don't understand... not yet, at least. I had to stop. I'm sorry. You... You'll see why."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希露出了痛苦的笑容，温柔地挪开了你的手。{/n}“你不明白……至少现在还不明白。我不得不停下来。我很抱歉，你……你会明白原因的。”

languages.text: {n}El interrogador sonríe con amargura y aparta tus manos suavemente.{/n} «No lo entiende... todavía no, por lo menos. Pero tenía que parar. Lo siento. Verá... verá por qué».
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator smiles caustically and gently removes your hands.{/n} "You don't understand... not yet, at least. I had to stop. I'm sorry. You... You'll see why."

traits.locale_text: {n}El interrogador sonríe con amargura y aparta tus manos suavemente.{/n} «No lo entiende... todavía no, por lo menos. Pero tenía que parar. Lo siento. Verá... verá por qué».

languages.text: {n}インテロゲイターは不敵な笑みを浮かべ、あなたの手をそっと離す。{/n}「あなたはわかっていない…少なくとも、まだダメだ。俺はこんなことをしてはいけない。すまない。理由は…そのうちわかる」
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator smiles caustically and gently removes your hands.{/n} "You don't understand... not yet, at least. I had to stop. I'm sorry. You... You'll see why."

traits.locale_text: {n}インテロゲイターは不敵な笑みを浮かべ、あなたの手をそっと離す。{/n}「あなたはわかっていない…少なくとも、まだダメだ。俺はこんなことをしてはいけない。すまない。理由は…そのうちわかる」

languages.text: {n}Avec un sourire amer, l'interrogateur retire délicatement vos mains.{/n} « Vous ne comprenez pas... pas encore. Je devais y mettre un terme. Je suis désolé. Vous... Vous comprendrez pourquoi. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator smiles caustically and gently removes your hands.{/n} "You don't understand... not yet, at least. I had to stop. I'm sorry. You... You'll see why."

traits.locale_text: {n}Avec un sourire amer, l'interrogateur retire délicatement vos mains.{/n} « Vous ne comprenez pas... pas encore. Je devais y mettre un terme. Je suis désolé. Vous... Vous comprendrez pourquoi. »

languages.text: {n}Der Interrogator lächelt sarkastisch und schiebt vorsichtig deine Hände von sich weg.{/n} "Ihr versteht es nicht ... zumindest noch nicht. Ich musste aufhören. Es tut mir leid. Ihr ... Ihr werdet sehen warum."
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator smiles caustically and gently removes your hands.{/n} "You don't understand... not yet, at least. I had to stop. I'm sorry. You... You'll see why."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Interrogator lächelt sarkastisch und schiebt vorsichtig deine Hände von sich weg.{/n} "Ihr versteht es nicht ... zumindest noch nicht. Ich musste aufhören. Es tut mir leid. Ihr ... Ihr werdet sehen warum."

languages.text: {n}Acı bir şekilde gülümseyen Sorgucu, nazikçe ellerini çekiyor.{/n} "Anlamıyorsun. En azından şimdilik... Durmam gerekiyordu. Üzgünüm. Sen... Nedenini anlayacaksın."
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator smiles caustically and gently removes your hands.{/n} "You don't understand... not yet, at least. I had to stop. I'm sorry. You... You'll see why."
